All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractLayoutRectangle
Class defining methods for a rectangle (and implementing some).
AddedType
The type of element that has been added to the petrinet state model.
AdjustArrowHeadsListener
The listener interface for receiving adjust arrow heads events.
DuplicateIdException
The Class DuplicateIdException.
GraphStreamPetrinetGraph
A GraphStream implementation of PetrinetGraph.
GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
A GraphStream implementation of ReachabilityGraph.
InvalidEdgeOperationException
The Class InvalidEdgeOperationException.
IterableMap<K,V>
A Map that is iterable and can represent a HashMap or a TreeMap with sorted keys when passing a Comparator to the constructor.
Layout
This class implements the custom layouts in LayoutType for the GraphStream library.
LayoutEdge
Class representing an edge in the layout.
LayoutLine
Class representing a line.
LayoutNode
Class representing a node in the Layout.
LayoutPoint
Point with x and y coordinate implemented using double.
LayoutPointInterface
Interface representing a point.
LayoutRectangle
Class representing a rectangle.
LayoutType
Enumerates the different available layout types.
Main
The main class that serves as the entry point for the Petrinet Simulator program.
MainController
A controller managing all the GUI components at the level of the mainframe.
MainFrame
This is the main frame of the program.
NumberOfTokensChangedListener
The listener interface for receiving events signifying the number of tokens for a place has changed.
Petrinet
Class representing a petrinet.
PetrinetAnalyser
Class holding methods for analyzing a petrinet and returning results..
PetrinetComponentChangedListener
The listener interface for receiving events signifying components of a petrinet have changed.
PetrinetEditorController
An editor for an instance of Petrinet being linked to an implementing instance of PetrinetGraph.
PetrinetElement
The Class PetrinetElement.
PetrinetException
The Class PetrinetException.
PetrinetGraph
Interface for a graph representing a petrinet.
PetrinetMenu
A custom JMenuBar consisting of
PetrinetMenuController
An interface defining methods for entries in the menus.
PetrinetPanel
An implementation of the PetrinetPanelInterface.
PetrinetPanelInterface
An interface for a JPanel presenting a Petrinet with its according reachability graph loaded from a file.
PetrinetState
Class representing the state of a petrinet.
PetrinetStateChangedListener
The listener interface for receiving events signifying the state of a petrinet has changed.
PetrinetToolbar
A toolbar for interactions with petrinets via a PetrinetToolbarController representing the current state of a PetrinetPanelInterface.
PetrinetToolbarController
A controller defining methods used by a petrinet toolbar.
PetrinetViewerController
Controller handling a petrinet model.
Place
Class that represents places in petrinets.
PNMLParser
The Class PNMLParser.
ReachabilityGraph
Class representing a reachability graph.
ReachabilityGraphUndoQueue
Class representing an undo queue for a reachability graph.
ReachabilityGraphUndoQueueState
Class representing a state in the undo queue.
ReachabilityStateChangedListener
The listener interface for receiving events that signify that the state of the reachability graph has changed.
ResizableSplitPane
A subclass of JSplitPane but the divider stays in place even if the parent container is resized.
ToolbarButton
A button used for the PetrinetToolbar.
ToolbarChangedListener
The listener interface for receiving events that need to set certain buttons of the toolbar.
ToolbarImage
An enum listing all available ToolbarImages and defining their name for the file in the IMAGE_ROOT_FOLDER (originally obtained from iconoir.com).
ToolbarMode
An enum representing the two modes the toolbar can be in: VIEWER and EDITOR.
Transition
Class representing transitions in petrinets.
TransitionStateListener
The listener interface for receiving events signifying that the state of a transition has changed.
